subject: Rename Complete Designs to Looks with simplified presets
body:
Replace complex style presets with focused "Looks" that only apply:
- Overlay (type, color, opacity)
- Fonts (title/body)
- Text alignment (horizontal/vertical)
- Image filters (grayscale, sepia, blur, contrast, brightness)

Looks no longer change theme or layout structure - those are now
independent preset categories in the Presets tab.

12 looks organized into 4 categories:
- Clean: Clean, Minimal, Soft
- Bold: Bold, Dramatic, Punch
- Vintage: Vintage, Retro, Film
- Noir: Noir, Mono, Duotone

https://claude.ai/code/session_01UGQ1gnJBpkhWY5hT3GXvNF
title: Rename Complete Designs to Looks with simplified presets
